string-array.item: This is the Chicago Plantarium\nwith many space adventures
This is the Chicago Art Institute\nwhere beautiful work is displayed
Get a taste of China in the US\nin Chinatown Chicago
An absolute must see in Chicago\nwith beautiful statues and fountains
Home to one of the most famous ferris\nwheels in history, you cannot miss it
Held record for tallest building in\nthe world and is still a sight to see
Consisting of beautiful marine life\nit really is quite an experience
Home of The Chicago Cubs\nbaseball team
